source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_000<tab>We of the Brotherhood devote our lives to the pursuit of true martial perfection, as you well know. Yet is it enough for a single Amalj'aa to achieve the limits of his strength?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_000強き者よ、我らが一党は至強を求むる！
至強とはすなわち、強きを乗り越えた先にあるもの。
ゆえに無力なる若輩を拐いし者は、打倒すべき宿敵なり！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_001<tab>No, the martial prowess we achieve is passed down from father to son, father to son. So does our strength grow through generations, those that follow reaching heights of puissance their forefathers never knew.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_001これを完膚なきまでに討ち負かし、拐われし同胞を救出する。
それこそが我らに架せられし宿命と心得よ！
志操堅固、剛毅木訥（ごうきぼくとつ）！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_002<tab>This sniveling cur that would break this chain does us the ultimate dishonor. He will answer for the abduction of our young, and he will answer in blood.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_002再びヒトの地に赴くならば、相応の準備が必須。
まずは今一度、ヤドヴ・ガーと相見え、
同胞奪回と宿敵打倒の策を練るが肝要。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_003<tab>Honored ally, you and Yadovv Gah must go forth and find this wretch. Go forth in courage, and know that when the time comes, your warleader will fight at your side, and our strength will be as one, a towering fist of rage to crush the life from our foe.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_003いずれ機が熟し、我が武を示す時あらば、
この戦鬼、ハムジ・ガーも勇み立ちて貴君の元に馳せ参じよう！
気炎万丈、ことにあたるべし！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_004<tab>Aside from Loonh Gah and yourself, I thought your kind weak in body and spirit. And yet I am told that the fiercest warriors among our kin were no match for this man. Is the peak of martial perfection yet so far from our grasp!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_004ヒトは我らと比するに、脆弱矮小なる躯体の持ち主と思うていた。
されど戦陣の手錬どもを鎧袖一触に伏すほどの傑物がいたとは。
真、これすなわち浅識、拙陋の極み……至強の道は遥か遠い！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_010<tab>Honored ally, I am in your debt. The Ul'dahns' hatred for our kind runs even deeper than I imagined. Had the Brass Blades found me before you and your friend did, I fear I would have been forced to do...terrible things.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_010冒険者殿、先程は大変お世話になり申した！
聞けばウルダハは獣人排斥を是とする社会の様子。
真、君子危うきに近寄らず、であり申した。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_011<tab>You have spoken with the warleader. Every moment the hatchlings remain in their abductor's clutches, our dishonor grows. We must take the fight to him, and do so with speed! And yet, we know not where he has fled.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_011それがしの潜入、拐われし子の奪還に至らねども、
千載一遇、「シルビア」殿という協力者を得たり。
彼女より冒険者殿に託を承っており申す。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_012<tab>...But perhaps your enigmatic friend does, for she has left for you a message. She would speak with you in Ul'dah, where I fear my kind are not welcome. You will go and hear her tale, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_012何か重要な用件がある様子、会って是非とも話をしたいとの由。
ウルダハの主門にて、お待ち申しておるとのこと。
早速、伺ってみては如何か？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_013<tab>(-???-)And here I thought you one of us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_013(-？？？？-)おいおいおい、ちょっと待てよっ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_014<tab>Running off without so much as a word? Is this how you treat a friend and ally? Your ancestors would turn in their graves!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_014オメェ、せっかく「灰の陣営」に来たってのに、
俺に挨拶もしねぇで帰るつもりかっ！？
ちょっと薄情すぎるんじゃねぇか～？　ったくよぉ……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_015<tab>I overheard your talk with the warleader. You pursue a foe the likes of which we have never seen─a man who embodies the essence of martial perfection for which we strive. Only a fool would pursue him alone!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_015話は聞いたぜ！
なんだか、すっげぇ強ぇ奴がいるらしいな！
誇り高き戦士として、一度お手合わせ願いてぇもんだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_016<tab>On my honor as a warrior of the Brotherhood of Ash, I, Loonh Gah, would face him with you.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_016オメェ、ウルダハに行くんだろ？
だったら、俺も行くぜ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_017<tab>What is this madness, Loonh Gah!? The fiercest of our kin were bested easily by this man! If he has reached the peak of martial perfection, you have only begun your journey up the mountain!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_017ルーン・ガー！　勝手な行動は慎むべし！
ヒトの世界は伏魔殿、垂堂之戒（すいどうのいましめ）！
未熟なお主には、荷が重い任務であり申す！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_018<tab>And how will I ever reach my potential save by trying my skills against a worthy foe!? Besides, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> travels to Ul'dah, does <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> not? You said it yourself. You would not be welcome there, but I─Amalj'aa within, but Miqo'te without─can move freely among its people.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_018いいじゃねぇかよ～！　カタいこと言うなって、兄弟！
それに俺の心はアマルジャ族だが、ナリは一応、ヒトなんだぜ？
ウルダハに潜入するなら、それこそ適任じゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_019<tab>I will hear no further challenges. Let us be off, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This foray into the heart of civilization puts me ill at ease...but no matter! The battle that awaits us stirs the passions deep within my soul!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_019よっし！　そうと決まれば早速出発だ！
いや～、ヒトの街かぁ……珍しいモノが沢山あんだろうなぁ！
よろしく頼むぜ！　)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_020<tab>Loonh Gah's passion I will not deny, but her wisdom is often lacking. The warleader would not be pleased to hear of her true intentions. I shall devise a suitable justification for her absence.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_020……跳ねっ返りの未熟者め。
我が長、ハムジ・ガーに知れたら怒髪衝天……
後でキツく折檻されても知らぬぞ。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_021<tab>Still, when that one has steeled her will, few if any in the Brotherhood can stop her. See that she does not come to harm, honored ally. Your friend awaits you at the Gate of Nald.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_021「シルビア」殿は、ウルダハの「ナル大門」前で、
お待ちしていると言っており申した。
捲土重来、離合集散……よろしくお願いし申す！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_022<tab>Loonh Gah thinks herself a seasoned warrior, but to us, she is still but a hatchling. A hatchling with a bright future, but a hatchling nonetheless. Keep her safe, honored ally, that her burning flame is not quenched prematurely.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_YADOVVGAH_000_022ルーン・ガーめ……喜色満面、またまだ子供であり申す。
しかし、あやつは元来、我らとは異なる種族……
故郷の空気を味わわせることも、親心なのかもしれぬ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_030<tab>You come, and you bring a strong ally. This is inspiriting, indeed.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_030来てくれてありがとう……)) (( )) 02 /var>。
アマルジャ族の使いの女の子も、連れてきてくれるなんて……
心強い……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_031<tab>The sylphs, the Sahagin, the kobolds, the Ixal...and now the Amalj'aa. Our best efforts could not thwart the tragedy that strikes at each of Eorzea's beast tribes. And yet all is not lost...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_031アナタからの情報は、私も確認した。
「黒死の奏者」……ナザ・ア・ジャーブを雇った黒幕……
これまでの、すべての獣人誘拐事件を仕組んだ張本人……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_032<tab>For with each heinous act, the shadow that conceals our villains is lifted... Nhaza'a Jaab, the Ebon Claw... The Laughing Alchemists... The mastermind behind this dark plot will elude us no longer!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_032「自笑堂」（じしょうどう）……。
恐らくその商会の主が、事件の黒幕に間違いない。
ついに……ついに見つけた……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_033<tab>But first, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there is something I must tell you, and someone you must meet. When you are ready, come to the Gate of Thal.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_033……)) (( )) 02 /var>、アナタに告白したいことがある。
そして、会ってほしい人がいるの。
「ザル大門」の近くで待ってる……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_035<tab>So this is Ul'dah─truly, every ilm as glorious as the stories say! Though these walls are so high, I must confess to feeling a bit...closed in.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_035うっひょー！　ここがウルダハかぁ！
人がいっぺぇいて、なんか高けぇ建物だらけだぜー！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_041<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Doubtless you wonder what this place is...who I am. Finally, the time has come that I may tell you. Allow me to welcome you to...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_041)) (( )) 02 /var>、待っていたわ。
ようこそ、私たちのアジトへ。
ここは……

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_042<tab>(-???-)...The head offices of the Ashcrown Consortium─Eorzea's greatest purveyor of all things crystal!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_042(-？？？？-)「アッシュクラウン商会」の商館！
エオルゼアをまたにかけるクリスタル交易商です！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_043<tab>I have the pleasure of being Shanga Meshanga, chairman and president of said consortium, and I have the honor of making your acquaintance. 'Tis rare that I am so blessed as to meet a like-minded soul.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_043失礼、冒険者さん！　どうも、初めまして！
僕は「アッシュクラウン商会」の会長、
シャンガ・メシャンガと言います。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_044<tab>Our dear Sylvie has told us all about your efforts to build trust and goodwill between Eorzeans and the five beast tribes. An admirable aim, and one I share.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_044「アッシュクラウン商会」は、
エオルゼア各地の獣人からクリスタルを購入し、
人の社会に流通させる商業組織です。

source:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_045The beastmen may be fearsome of appearance and eccentric in character, but are they truly so different from you and I? This is why I founded the Consortium. In purchasing crystals from amiable tribes in return for vital resources they require, I aim to aid them in becoming self-sufficient.
In this way, I hope to foster a lasting friendship between our peoples.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_045カッコ良く言えば、獣人と人を取り持つ架け橋となる存在。
もっとも、「正義の味方」を気取るつもりはありませんよ。
我々は、あくまで利益を求める商会ですから。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_046<tab>...It does not hurt that this arrangement has proved quite profitable, as well. If I performed these acts simply out of the goodness of my heart, I'm like to see my Ul'dahn citizenship revoked!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_046まぁ、最近は蛮神問題やら何やらで、
取引の市場はめっきり冷え込み、僕たちもすっかり日蔭者。
おおっぴらな商売が難しいご時世になってしまいましたけどね。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_047<tab>All jesting aside, it goes without saying that few in the sultanate share my fondness for beastmen─and so I keep up appearances as a common trader. I would ask that you keep all that I have told you in the closest of confidence.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_047ここは商会のウルダハ支部……ですが、どうかご内密に。
獣人排斥法が施行されているウルダハでは、
お上に知れたら大事ですから。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_048<tab>Forgive me for having kept you in the dark, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As a humble assistant to Master Shanga, I did not feel it was my place to speak of the Consortium's true aims.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_048)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
今まで秘密にしていた、私の素性を告白する。
私は「アッシュクラウン商会」の一員……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_049<tab>A bit <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> humble, I say. Though Miss Sylvie joined our ranks only recently, she has shown a remarkable commitment to the ideals we espouse. I consider her amongst the Consortium's most valuable members. She has proven particularly capable in the investigation of the beastman abductions.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_049そう、彼女は頼もしい商会の仲間です。
そして今回の「獣人連続誘拐事件」の危険な調査任務に、
自ら志願してくれました。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_050<tab>If you would know the truth, these crimes are nothing new. The Consortium has been investigating similar reports from the beast tribes for some time, but to no avail. But over time, they grew more frequent, more bold...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_050獣人の誘拐事件は、実は以前から断続的に行われていました。
我々商会も由々しき問題として、調査をしていたのです。
しかし、奴らの犯行は巧妙、尻尾さえも掴めなかった……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_051<tab>I will never forgive them... Never...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_051……許さない……！
奴らは……私の……大切な仲間を……殺した……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it? You are a rare <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>─one that sylph, kobold, Sahagin, Amalj'aa, and Ixal alike will look in the eye and call friend.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_052冒険者さん、貴方は人を含めた、
エオルゼアの代表的な6つの種族の縁を取り持ち、
信頼の絆を築いた、我々にとってかけがえのない存在。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_053<tab>Far and wide has the Ashcrown Consortium searched, but I believe we have found our champion. Join us, friend, that we might bring this menace who would prey on innocent beastmen to justice.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SHANGAMESHANGA_000_000_053どうか我々「アッシュクラウン商会」も、
貴方の捜査活動に協力をさせてください！
引き続き、ここにいるシルビアをよろしくおねがいします！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_054<tab>Without you, our cause is lost. We...are lost... You will join us, won't you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_054)) (( )) 02 /var>……今まで黙っていて、ごめんなさい。
力を合わせ、卑劣な獣人連続誘拐犯を捕えましょう……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_055<tab>I thank you. Not long ago, a messenger arrived on behalf of Momodi at the Quicksand. It would seem she would speak with you about an important matter.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_055先程、「クイックサンド」のモモディから、
アナタ宛に伝言があったの……。
この事件に関して、話があるみたい……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_056<tab>I do not understand all that was spoken, but it matters little. What matters is that we are one step closer to exacting vengeance on our hated foe!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_056伝言？　よぉし、いってみようぜっ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_057<tab>Pray forgive me for treating you so coldly when we first met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I...am slow to trust others, but you have proven yourself a true friend.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_057……今まで黙っていて、ごめんなさい。
商会の存在が知れると、商売ができなくなる。
でも、アナタは信頼できる存在……そう確信した。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_058<tab>Master Shanga speaks true, I am sure of it. You will be the champion the Consortium has long sought, and together we will save the beast tribes of Eorzea from a grim fate!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_058どうか私たち「アッシュクラウン商会」と力を合わせ、
卑劣な獣人連続誘拐犯を捕えましょう……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MOMODI_000_000_060<tab>There you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. These three have been askin' all over for you!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MOMODI_000_000_060あらあら、いらっしゃい。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、待ってたのよ！
……みなさーん、いらしたわよー！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_061<tab>It heartens me to see you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was afraid the kidnapper had stowed you away on an airship somewhere!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_061冒険者さん！
お待ちしてました！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_062<tab>Lieutenant Skaetswys o' the Maelstrom, reportin' fer duty! I meant to bring Gi Gu along, but 'e gave me some excuse about 'avin' lost 'is walkin' shoes...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_062黒渦団スケートスィス少甲士、只今参りました！
ともに事件の解決に向け、友軍支援の許可をお願いします！
……な～んてね！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_063<tab>A pleasure to see you again, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Thinking that my academic expertise might avail you in your search for the kidnapper, I decided to make the trip to Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_063ボクも、何か手伝えることがあったらと思いまして……
仮宿の皆さんにお暇をいただき、はりきってやって来ました！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_064<tab>Elder Frixio and the others danced wildly when I told them I might not return to Little Solace. I fear the overwhelming sorrow and loss at my departure has driven the poor things to madness. And yet, I knew it was my calling to join you!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_064「別にアンタみたいなヘッポコ、
　もう帰ってこなくてもいいでふっち？　バイバイでふっち！」
……って、本当にお暇になりかねない感じでしたが……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_065<tab>These three will join us in battle, adventurer? Such allies are welcome indeed! Though we might do without the skinny fellow with the spectacles...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_065おおっ！　なんか賑やかな感じで楽しそうだなぁー！
こいつら、みんなオメェの仲間かぁ？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_066<tab>Since we last met, I did my own research into the Laughing Alchemists of whom Advisor Colson spoke. Sadly, reliable information on this organization is not easily come by...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_066先ほど情報交換をして、状況は把握しています。
「獣人連続誘拐事件」の黒幕は「自笑堂」。
しかし、その組織に対する情報がまだ足りない。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_067<tab>What would they stand to gain from a mass abduction of the realm's beastmen? Their motives are a mystery wrapped in an enigma...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_067そもそも奴らは、なぜ獣人を誘拐したのか？
その目的が……謎に包まれている……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_068<tab>...As are the current whereabouts of their 'ired blade. I've got a feelin' that whatever they're plottin', we've got precious little time to put a stop to it.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_068アタシたちが追ってた実行犯……
「黒死の奏者」っていう奴も、まだ行方知れずだしね。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_069<tab>Yes, it is clear that time is of the essence. In my estimation, the best course of action would be for us to split up and pursue different angles that might afford us further clues. Would we all be in agreement?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_069ここは、ボクたち全員で、
手分けして情報を収集するというのはどうでしょう？
これだけ仲間がいれば、きっと手掛かりが見つかりますよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_070<tab>I will pay a visit to the airship landing. By speaking to the deckhands and examining the records, perhaps I can ascertain the destination of the Laughing Alchemists' vessel.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_070では、僕は「ウルダハ・ランディング」で、
あらゆる記録を洗い直し、
「自笑堂」が保有すると思われる飛空艇の行方を探ります。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_071<tab>I 'eard from my superiors o' beastman abductions reported last year. No one thought much of 'em at the time, but in light o' recent events, I reckon they warrant a closer investigation.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_071アタシは、過去の獣人誘拐事件の犯罪履歴を洗うわ！
獣人の誘拐は、以前から断続的に行われてたんでしょ？
だったら、関連する事件の報告書が残ってるかもしれない！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_071<tab>I have a friend or two at the Alchemists' Guild. Perhaps they might be able to shed light on the Laughing Alchemists and their shady dealings.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_071ボクは「自笑堂」の経営実態を調べてみましょう！
「自笑堂」は表向き、錬金素材の卸し売り業。
錬金術師ギルドをあたったら、何か手掛かりがあるはずです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_072<tab>I shall pursue this man they call the Ebon Claw. He is hiding right under my nose. I can smell it, and feel it in my bones!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_072じゃあ、俺は実行犯の「黒死の奏者」っていう奴を探すぜ！
きっと、まだこのウルダハにいるはずだ。
草の根分けてでも探し出してやっから、まってろよぉ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_073<tab>Excellent, my friends! Whatever information we come upon, we will share with <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here. Now let us get to work! Our beastman friends are counting on us!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_073各自、何か有力な情報があったら、冒険者さんに報告を！
エオルゼアの獣人のために、力を合わせがんばりましょう！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MOMODI_000_000_074<tab>Quite a motley crew o' friends you have there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. And yet for some reason, when I look at you, I can't help but feel the strangest sort o' confidence. Whoever it is you're goin' after, I certainly wouldn't want to be him!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MOMODI_000_000_074頼もしい仲間がたくさんいて、とてもうらやましいわ。
これもきっと、)) (( )) 02 /var>の人柄のおかげね。
皆で力を合わせ、きっと目的を達成してね！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_080<tab>You couldn't have come at a better time! I was just perusing the arrival and departure records, and sure enough, a series of entries quickly caught my eye.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_080ああ、冒険者さん、いいところへ！
ウルダハ・ランディングを利用している、
民間飛空艇の入港記録を片っ端から調べてみたのですが……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_081<tab>To wit, numerous requests for emergency landing clearance for a vessel registered to one Memeriga, chairman of the Laughing Alchemists!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_081申請者リストの中に見つけたんです。
「自笑堂」を経営するララフェル族の富豪、
「メメリガ」氏の名前をですよ。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_082<tab>These entries grow more frequent over the past six moons or so, corresponding precisely with the recent outbreak of beastman abductions.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_082どうやらこの半年の間に、かなり頻繁に、
エオルゼア各地へと飛び回っているようですね。
恐らく目的は「獣人誘拐」に間違いありません！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_083<tab>Memeriga... I have heard the name before, and heard things I would rather forget. A man of great wealth, few can─or are willing to─say how he came by his fortunes. Some rumors say he deals in black market weapons, some suggest far worse. In some circles, they even call him “the Deathmonger.”
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_083ちなみに「メメリガ」という人物ですが……
非合法組織の類いに、武器やら何やらを売りさばく、
「死の商人」だという黒い噂もあるようです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_084<tab>I think we can safely say that we've found the man pulling the strings behind these beastman abductions. But two questions remain: to what end, and where might we find him?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_084恐らく「獣人連続誘拐事件」の黒幕は、
このメメリガという男に間違いはなさそうですね……！
奴は今、どこに……？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_085<tab>Our friends have finished their investigations, as well? Splendid! Let us return to the Ashcrown Consortium offices and plot our next course of action.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_085……どうやら、みんなの集めた情報が出そろったようですね。
一度「アッシュクラウン商会」のシルビアさんに報告し、
内容を整理してみてはいかがですか？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_086<tab>From providing deadly force to both sides of a bloody conflict to selling beggars and orphans as glorified slave-soldiers─Ul'dah has its share of unscrupulous merchants, but none have made dealing in death their business quite like Memeriga.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_086メメリガという男……対立する勢力両方に武器を提供したり、
貧民を傭兵にして、奴隷同然に悲惨な戦地に送り込んだり……
まさしく「死の商人」！　かなり卑劣な輩のようです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_091<tab>There ye are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ye'll be 'appy to 'ear that I was able to...<var 1A 02 /var>acquire<var 1A 01 /var>...the records of all reported cases o' beastman disappearances over the past year.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_091)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！　
今、不滅隊に依頼し、ここ半年間にウルダハで起きた、
事件の報告書を閲覧させてもらっていたところです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_092<tab>'Ow, ye ask? Let's just say that Skaetswys 'as more than a few friends, an' not all o' them are as worthless as Gi Gu and 'is sorry lot.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_092ふふふ、アタシ、これでも黒渦団特務士官ですから、
それなりに顔がきくんですよ？
で、その報告書の内容にひとつ、不審な点が……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_093<tab>Anyroad, 'ere's one case that caught me eye. Dated six moons ago or thereabout. An 'undred-odd sylph corpses unearthed in northern Thanalan, cause o' death unknown.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_093「東ザナラーンで謎の蛮族の大量変死体を発見」……
どうやら半年前、多数のシルフ族の遺体が、
荒野に遺棄されていたのが発見されたらしいんです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_094<tab>'Ad the bodies belonged to Ul'dahn citizens, ye can bet yer bottom gil this story would've graced the front page o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>. But beastmen? Doubtless they'd turned 'ostile and were dispatched by some well-meanin' adventurers─or so was the reasonin' at the time.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_094……被害者が人ではなく、獣人だったので事件性は考慮されず、
捜査は打ち切りになったようですが……
ザナラーンでシルフ族の遺体……なんだか不自然ですよね？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_095<tab>But recent events put this incident in a whole new light. Sylphs in Thanalan? Aye, that's more than a mite suspicious. As was the state o' the bodies─not a single external wound. Poison, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_095「シルフ族は外傷はなく、毒殺された模様」……。
黒衣森から連れ去られている点を考えると、
誘拐被害者である可能性も否定できないような……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_096<tab>I'm no agent of enquiry, but I'd wager there's more than a passin' connection between this and the recent beastman abductions. We'll just 'ave to see what clues the others turn up, and work from there.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_096むむむ、謎は深まるばかり……。
とりあえず、ほかの皆が集めている情報を待って、
複合的に推理するしかないようです……以上、報告終わりっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_097<tab>Already spoken with the others, 'ave ye? Well, then I reckon it's time we made our next move. Let's gather back at the Ashcrown Consortium and put our 'eads together.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_097……おっ、どうやらみんなの情報収集が終わったみたいですね。
「アッシュクラウン商会」のシルビアさんに報告して、
今後の対策を練りましょう！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_098<tab>We don't see too many sylphs where I come from, but from what I 'ear they're a fun-lovin', 'ard-workin' folk. Surely they deserved better than to die forgotten in a faraway land...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_098ザナラーンでシルフ族の遺体……。
やはりシルフ族は何者かに誘拐され、
この地で何かの目的のため犠牲になった……許せないっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_100<tab>Oh, adventurer! I was wondering when you might show up. I've been perusing the pages of the guild ledger for all purchases made by the Laughing Alchemists.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_100冒険者さん、聞いてください！
錬金術師ギルドの帳簿を洗って、
「自笑堂」との取引記録を調べたんです！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_101<tab>Quite an assortment of rare and curious ingredients, I must say. Eighty hunks of rotted voidsent flesh, twenty bulbs of the <var 1A 02 /var>narcissus phantasmus<var 1A 01 /var>, fifty ponzes of lost soul entrails...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_101叩いたら、嫌というほど埃が出てきましたよ！
奴ら、かなり怪しい錬金素材を、しかも大量に購入しています。
「妖異の腐肉」に「怪水仙の球根」、「死霊の臓物」……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_102<tab>As much as this may shock you, friend, the alchemical arts fall somewhat outside my otherwise extensive area of expertise. An alchemist acquaintance of mine, however, informed me that the sale of such items on the open market is strictly prohibited.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_102僕は錬金術については専門外ですが……
いずれも取り扱いに、特別な許可がいる品とのことです。
取引資格がある「自笑堂」だからこそ、購入できたようですが。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_103<tab>As he told it, they have been known to be employed in the practice of certain...forbidden arts─the precise nature of which he seemed unwilling to relate in detail.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_103ちなみに、これらの素材の取引に資格がいるのは、
禁忌とされる「死霊術」に転用可能なためだとか……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_104<tab>Forbidden arts... Elder Frixio forbade me from ever adorning myself in chocobo feathers again─by the gods!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_104「自笑堂」の目的は……「死霊術」がらみ？
死霊を生み出す霊薬を、ひそかに開発してたりして……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_105<tab>Have the Laughing Alchemists devised an elixir to turn beastmen into beastbirds!? If so, I daresay we have a crisis of colossal proportions on our hands!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_105じゃあ、誘拐された獣人たちは……
ま、ま、ま、ま、まさか……実験に……！？
……こ、これは一大事ですよ、冒険者さんっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_106<tab>The others have finished their investigations? Wonderful! Come, friend! Let us hurry back to the Ashcrown Consortium before all of Eorzea is trampled under the feet of an army of crazed chocobeasts!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_106……おおっ、みなさんからの情報が集まりましたか！？
では、「アッシュクラウン商会」のシルビアさんに報告し、
今後の対策を練りましょう！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_107<tab>I know not what the Laughing Alchemists mean to do with their avian army, but the mere thought strikes fear into the very depths of my soul...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_107でも、人の「ゾンビー」ならともかく、
獣人の死霊だなんて、聞いたことはありません。
も、もしかして……霊薬の改良の目的って……！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_110<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Through the twisted, tortuous streets of this city I have tracked our quarry. And at long last, I have found his lair!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_110)) (( )) 02 /var>！
いいとこに来てくれたっ！　ついに見つけたぜ！
その「ナザ・ナントカ」っつー悪者の滞在先をよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_111<tab>Within the garish chambers of this place, the Platinum Mirage, the craven cur slumbers, using his misbegotten riches to shelter himself from our vengeance!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_111どうやら奴は、この「プラチナミラージュ」っていう、
カジノホテルのスイートルームにいるらしいぜ！
なんだかキンピカで、趣味の悪りぃとこだよなぁ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_112<tab>I demanded entrance so that I might meet the fiend in single combat, but that fool child over there had the gall to refuse me entry!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_112……それでよぉ、もっと詳しく調べるために、
中に潜入しようとしたんだけどよ。
あの受付のバカ女に止められちまったんだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_113<tab>“We cannot confirm your membership without looking upon your face, milady,” she said. “Do come back when you have removed that ridiculous costume and have dressed a bit more formally.”
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_113「そのような猥雑な身なりで、
　当施設への入場は御遠慮ください」……だってよぉ！
けっ、お高くとまりやがって！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_114<tab>...Costume!? This battlemask is a symbol of my rebirth and resolve! It represents my transformation into an Amalj'aa soldier, ever strong and proud. I would die before removing it from my face for so petty a reason!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_114つーか、「猥雑」って何だよっ！
俺の格好のどこが猥雑だってんだよっ！？
これは誇り高きアマルジャ族の戦装束だっての！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_115<tab>...Besides, these are the only garments I own. Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? You are more familiar with “civilized” life than I. How might I best approach this?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_115オイ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
なんとか中に入る手立てはねぇかなぁ？
服を着替えるつっても、俺、金もってねーしなぁ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_116<tab>You have spoken to all the others? Excellent. We should return to the Ashcrown Consortium and plot our next course of action.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_116……おっ、どうやら情報が出そろったみてぇじゃねぇか！
だったら頼む！　「アッシュクラウン商会」に行って、
シルビアに「プラチナミラージュ」の入り方を聞いてきてくれ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_117<tab>Is my appearance truly so...unusual...to the people of this nation? Do they not know a true warrior when they see one!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_117なぁ、俺のこの格好って、そんなに変か？
……身軽だし、戦いやすくて良いと思うんだけどなぁ。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ESSYLT_000_118<tab>Welcome to the Platinum Mirage, Ul'dah's oasis of fortune. Be aware that entrance is limited to members, and that our dress code is strictly enforced.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ESSYLT_000_118こちら、カジノホテル「プラチナミラージュ」でございます。
すみませんが、会員でない方、身なりの相応しくないお客様には、
入場をお断りさせていただいております。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_120<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The others have yet to return, but I fear our time grows short. Did they share with you their findings?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_120)) (( )) 02 /var>、待ってた……。
その顔からすると、情報を掴んだのね……？
獣人誘拐事件の真相に近づくための情報を……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_121<tab>...I see. All signs point to the Laughing Alchemists and their chairman, Master Memeriga, as being the mastermind behind these terrible crimes.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_121皆が集めてくれた情報を総合しましょう……。
黒幕は「自笑堂」を経営する「メメリガ」なる人物……
彼は「死の商人」という裏の顔を持っていた……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_122<tab>What's more, he has been involved in shady dealings with the Alchemists' Guild, procuring various prohibited substances known to be used in forbidden arts...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_122彼の商会は、特別な錬金素材を調達していた……
いずれも「死霊術」に関わる危険な品々……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_123<tab>In a seemingly unrelated event, the corpses of countless sylphs were unearthed in Thanalan six moons past, dead most likely from poison. Since that day, beastman abductions have been reported with increasing regularity across the realm.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_123一方、ザナラーンではシルフ族の毒殺体が発見され……
各地では、連続して獣人誘拐事件が発生……。
導き出される答えはひとつね……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_124<tab>...I hoped against hope that it would not come to this, but the evidence is overwhelming. Yes, they call the man Deathmonger─it would seem he has decided to truly earn the name.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_124彼らは、伝承でのみ語られている、
すべての種族を死霊に変える禁忌の霊薬……
「六識の反魂香」を開発しようとしている……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_125<tab>Necromancy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The man has a mind to raise an undead army, born from the souls of our beastman friends!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_125ヒトはおろか、獣人までをも死霊と化して操れる霊薬……
まさに究極の兵器……！
……それが……奴らの……目的……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_126<tab>We must find him at once and put a stop to his madness! You say that his hired blade has taken up lodgings at the Platinum Mirage.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_126「黒死の奏者」の居場所を突き止めたのでしょう！？
冒険者さん、乗り込みましょう……！
直接、奴の口からメメリガの居場所を聞き出す……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_127<tab>Fortunately for us, Master Shanga is a member in the highest of standing. He should have no trouble securing entrance for us. Which leaves only the matter of Loonh Gah and the dress code...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_127「プラチナミラージュ」の会員証なら、
ウチの会長が持っているから、借りられるはず……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_100_127<tab>I know not if this will meet your friend's liking, but it should serve its purpose just the same.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_100_127それと、少しでも戦力がほしい……。
ルーンさんには、この「」を着て、
同行してもらいましょう……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_128<tab>I shall be along in due time. Nhaza'a Jaab...you will pay for your crimes against my loved ones...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_128私も準備が整ったら、すぐに追って駆けつける……。
ナザ・ア・ジャーブ……待ってなさい……！
もう……前のように、不覚はとらない……！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_129<tab>That dress should serve to secure Loonh Gah's passage into the halls of the Platinum Mirage.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_129「プラチナミラージュ」に入るために、
ルーンさんを、この「」に着替えさせるの……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_130<tab>I shall be along in due time. Nhaza'a Jaab...you will pay for your crimes against my loved ones...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_130私もすぐに後から駆けつける……。
「黒死の奏者」……ナザ・ア・ジャーブ、待ってなさい……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_140<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have been keeping close watch on the entrance to this place. The craven cur has yet to show his face─I suspect that he still cowers within the comforts of his chambers.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_140よぉ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
あれから入口を見張ってるんだが、奴が外出した形跡はないぜ。
まだ部屋にいるってことだ。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_141<tab>Did you speak with Sylvie? Was she able to secure us passage within? The battle calls me, adventurer! I can contain my rage no longer!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_141そっちはどうだ？
「プラチナミラージュ」に入る算段はついたか？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_142<tab>Hmmm...? What are these flimsy rags, and why do you show them to me?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_142………………？
……なんだよ、この布っキレは……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_143<tab>S-Surely you jest, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_143……も、もしかして、これを俺に着ろってのかっ！？
じ、じ、冗談じゃねぇぞっ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_144<tab>I...I am a warrior of the Amalj'aa! I would sooner see the flesh rent from my bones than clothe myself in these...s-soft, supple fabrics.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_144なんで戦士である俺が、こんな格好しなきゃいけねぇんだっ！
こんなオンナみてぇな服着るぐれぇなら、
裸になったほうが、まだマシだぜっ！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_145<tab>I truly...<var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var>...wear them...?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_145………………。
ほ、本当に着なくちゃ……ダメか？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_146<tab>Many moons have I lived, yet never have I suffered such dishonor! Were the lives of my brothers not at stake, I would rend these rags in my hands and leave this dreadful place in an instant!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_146ほ、本当だな…………？
本ッ当～に、これしかホテルの中に入る方法はねぇんだな？
嘘ついてたら、ブッ殺すぞっ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_147<tab>Very well, adventurer! I will wear these coward's tatters! But you must swear on your life that none back at home shall hear word of this madness!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_147ああああああっ！　わ～ったよ！
着りゃいいんだろっ！？　着りゃあっ！！
いいか？　ゼッテー笑うなよ？　ちょっとまってろっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_148<tab>Must you <var 1A 02 /var>gape<var 1A 01 /var> at me so? As if my shame did not cut deep enough already!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_148ジ、ジロジロみるんじゃねぇよっ！！
これでいいんだろっ！？　これでっ！？
……ホラ、さっさとホテルの中に潜入すんぞっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_149<tab>There had best not be anything else. ...There is something else, isn't there?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_149<tab>……なんだよ、まだ何かあんのかよ……？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_150<tab>You cannot possibly mean...my face...
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_150<tab>……もしかして……顔か……？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_151<tab>This battlemask was bestowed to me by the warleader himself! It is a symbol of my passion and pride─it marks me as a Brother of Ash! You may just as well ask me to rip the very flesh off my face! On this I shall not yield...the battlemask stays!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_151いやいやいやいやいや！！
こいつは、俺がアマルジャ族の戦士である証！
ハムジ・ガーの親父にもらった、大切な仮面なんだぞ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_152<tab>Gahhh! The shame...the indignity. Forgive me, Warleader...!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_152あ～もう、わかったよ！　とるよ、とりゃいいんだろ！？
「至強の戦士が執着するは唯一、強さのみ。
　他のあらゆる自尊心を捨てるべし」……親父の言葉だ……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_153<tab>It is for the lives of my brothers, for vengeance against our foe, and for the pursuit of martial perfection that I subject myself to this dishonor!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_153この「灰の一党」の戦士ルーン・ガー！
至強を目指すためなら、一時の恥ぐれぇかいてやらぁ！
アマルジャ魂、しっかり見とけよっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_154<tab>You are a friend, but say one word and it will be your last.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_154これでいいんだろ……？
…………黙れ、何も言うな！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_155<tab>Now let us go. Our fated battle with a mortal foe awaits within.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_155行くぞ！　シルビアもそろそろ来るころだ。
ここまで体張ってんだ！
「黒死の奏者」ってヤツをとっちめねぇと気が済まねぇ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_160<tab>I have never seen anything like this... It is a veritable palace!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_160ふええ……すっげぇなぁ！
まるで宮殿だぜ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_161<tab>Don't look now...
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_161<tab>「黒死の奏者」……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_162<tab>I do not recall summoning whores. Ul'dahn customs are so <var 1A 02 /var>crude<var 1A 01 /var>...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_162女を呼んだ憶えはないが……。
フゥ、なんて悪趣味なサービスだ。
下衆の節介ほど、気分を害するものはない。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_163<tab>Silence, fiend! You will pay for your crimes!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_163観念しなさい！
もうアナタに逃げ場はない……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_001_163<tab>S-Such...strength...!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_001_163<tab>ぐっ……！　つ、強えぇ……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_164<tab>Nhaza'a Jaab! We have uncovered your master's dark plot! The Deathmonger would slay beastmen en masse and raise an army of the dead, and you lend your strength to this heinous cause!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_164エオルゼア全土で行われた、一連の獣人誘拐事件……。
その実行犯である闇社会の冒険者、ナザ・ア・ジャーブ！
すべてのネタはあがっています！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_165<tab>Oh, that nonsense? Yes, now that you mention it, I do believe that was his silly little plot. Have you come here to stop me?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_165フゥ……そんなくだらないことを言うために、
お前たちはここに来たのか？
そして、俺の安息を妨げようというのか？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_166<tab>“Nonsense”? “Silly”!? Is the mass murder of thousands of innocent beastmen so humorous to you!? I know your type too well─you see beastmen as little more than feral savages!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_166くだらない……ですって！？
罪も力もない獣人を拐って、その命を弄ぶ……。
いくら相手が蛮族といえど……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_167<tab>I do? Well, well, this is quite a surprise. I have always strived to maintain equal disdain for all beings weaker than myself. That would be <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var>...in case you haven't been paying attention.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_167許されない……と言いたいのだろう？
フフ、そんなことは百も承知だ。
俺は蛮族を軽蔑していない、むしろ敬愛している。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_168<tab>If Master Memeriga would raise an army of zombie beastmen and conquer the realm, he can have it. I seek one thing and one thing alone...an equal.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_168だが、そんなことはどうでもいいんだ……
人も蛮族も、俺にとっては等しく無価値の存在。
俺はただ狂おしいほどの興奮……「熱狂」を求めたに過ぎない。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_169<tab>An...equal...?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_169<tab>ね、熱狂だと……！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_170<tab>I have traveled the realm a hundred times over and crossed blades with the greatest warriors Eorzea has known, and yet none─not a one!─can match my powers!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_170フフ、そう……「熱狂」だ。
この俺、ナザ・ア・ジャーブが生きる目的。
それは決して金や名誉、まして義理や人情でもない。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_171<tab>No, it is not for fame, not for riches, not for glory I fight. For once─just once!─I would know the thrill, the passion of facing a worthy foe on the field of battle! To smell the sweet stench of my impending death before emerging triumphant as I have always done!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_171すべては……「熱狂」……！
耐えられぬ渇望、内に秘めた快楽への衝動……！
甘き死に酔いしれる……これほどの「熱狂」があろうか！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_172<tab>Y-You...you would see thousands of innocents die just to satisfy your depraved thirst for thrills? If anyone here should be called “beast,” it is you!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_172けっ……ヘドが出るぜ！
手前勝手な性癖で、他人の命を弄ぶたぁ……
なんつーおぞましい……蛮族はテメェの方だ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_173<tab>My poor, misguided little girl... Death is but the blissful terminus of the lives of the weak. Come, and I shall show you its sweet embrace...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_173フッ、美を解せぬとは、罪深いお嬢ちゃんだ。
キツくしつけが必要だな……。
そして愛でてやろう、物言わぬ美しい屍にして……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_174<tab>When my friends vanished six moons ago, I asked myself why... What had they done to deserve such a fate? With the help of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> friends, I began to put the pieces together...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_174この事件の黒幕は……「自笑堂」の「メメリガ」！
その正体は、意のままに操れる死霊を生み出し、
不死の軍勢を作ろうとしている死の商人。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_175<tab>Beastmen... You... Memeriga would raise a legion of the undead─a limitless supply of deathless warriors that he could auction off to the highest bidder. Why, it's a veritable license to mint gil!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_175しかし、人を死霊化すれば、反発されることは明白！
それに奴隷や貧民を誘拐するのにも限度がある……。
そこでメメリガは、「蛮族」の存在に目を付けた。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_176<tab>But where would he find his dead? Exhuming the bodies of Eorzeans would quickly attract unwanted attention. But beastmen─seen by so many as a scourge to the realm─yes, who would miss a beastman or two, or two hundred, or two thousand!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_176人に仇なす蛮族を操り、不死の兵として戦地に送りこむ。
そして、自らは手を汚さず大金を得る……まさに一石三鳥。
なんて卑劣な発想……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_178<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Brava<var 1A 01 /var>, <var 1A 02 /var>brava<var 1A 01 /var>... Spoken with such <var 1A 02 /var>passion<var 1A 01 /var>. If I didn't know better, I'd say you were a beastman yourself...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_178フフ、見事な推理だ、感服したぞ。
お前はいったい……？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_179<tab>I... This... This one... You... Clawed one...killed this one's friends...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_179……許さない……で……ふっち……。
お前たちは……わたぴの大切な仲間たちを……殺した……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_180<tab>(-Silbexio-)This one will have revenge!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_180<tab>(-シルビア-)忘れたとは言わさないでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_181<tab>Are my eyes to be believed!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_181<tab>オ、オメェ、シルフ族だったのか！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_182<tab>(-Silbexio-)Answer me, clawed one! Where is master one!? Where can this one find this one's friends!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_182(-シルビア-)ナザ・ア・ジャーブ！
さぁ、白状するでふっち！
メメリガは、どこにいるでふっち！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_183<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> tell you, but I don't think Master Memeriga would be too pleased. And he <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> rather generous with his coin, you see...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_183フフ、黙秘させてもらうぞ。
俺は、これでも冒険者……相応の報酬を受け取っている。
たとえ下衆な輩だろうと、依頼人は裏切れないのでね。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_184<tab>Whatever the Deathmonger is paying you, we'll double it!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_184<tab>……では、あなたを雇い直しましょう。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_185<tab>...No, we'll triple it! Would you prefer your payment in gil? Jewels and gemstones, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_185メメリガは、あなたに幾らの報酬を払いました？
僕が今、ここでその倍……いや3倍のギルを払います。
支払は現金？　それとも宝石や手形がいいですか？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_186<tab>This is no mere idle bluff. I swear it on the name of my father, chairman of Highwind Skyways─mayhap you've heard of them?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_186ご安心を、ハッタリなんかじゃないですよ。
僕はこう見えて、あの「ハイウィンド飛空社」の御曹司。
お金なら、ウンザリするほど持ってますから。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_187<tab>Bwahahaha! Gwahahahahahaha! You speak madness! But this is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> kind of madness!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_187フフフ……フハハハハハハハハハ！　面白い！
そう、これこそが「熱狂」だ！
気に入ったぞ、お前たち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_188<tab>...Perhaps I have found worthy rivals, after all. Master Memeriga set forth for the Invisible City. Doubtless the experiments have already begun.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_188メメリガは、東ザナラーン「見えざる都」にいる。
今ごろは、誘拐した蛮族を実験台に、
試作した「六識の反魂香」の実験を始めているだろう。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_189<tab>G-Good heavens! So the poor beastmen are being transformed into chocobos as we speak!? We must stop them!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_189<tab>な、なんだってっ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_190<tab>...That is all I will say. Your offer is tempting, little man, but I have riches enough to last a lifetime. If you would face my blade, however, your presence is more than welcome.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_190フフフ、俺が言えるのはそこまでだ。
……もし、メメリガの実験を阻止するつもりなら、
俺も諸君らと剣を交えなくてはならないが、よろしいかな？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_191<tab>If it's a fight ye want, it's a fight ye'll get! An' this one'll be yer last!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_191望むところよっ！
憶えておきなさいっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_192<tab>Yes, yeeesss...<var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> the spirit! I expect nothing less than a bloody feast for the soul and senses. Do try not to disappoint me, now...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_192フフフ、小気味良い答えだ。
せいぜい俺を楽しませてくれ。
めくるめく熱狂の饗宴を……期待しているぞ……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_193<tab>I believe our business is done here. Let us leave this place.
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_193<tab>……いきましょう、皆さん。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_200<tab>Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This is the second time I have deceived you. I...no, this one...is a sylph of Little Solace.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_200……)) (( )) 02 /var>、皆さん、
今まで黙っていてすみません……。
先程お見せしたとおり、私の正体はシルフ族……でふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_201<tab>This one's true name is Silbexio. The walking one Sylvie is a creation of this one's skin-changing magicks.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_201わたぴの本当の名前は「シルベシオ」。
この姿は、ヒトの社会に溶け込むための擬態。
シルフ族お得意の「変化のおまぢない」でふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_202<tab>This one learned the ways and words of the walking ones. This one would walk among the walking ones and talk as walking ones talk, that these ones and walking ones might grow to understand each other.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_202わたぴは元々「シルフの仮宿」に棲んでいたのでふっち。
でも、よりヒトとの交流を深めようと、
仲間とともに仮宿を離れ、ヒトの社会へとやってきたのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_203<tab>Others felt as this one did. Together, these ones left Little Solace behind, seeking out the cities of walking ones. But these ones' journey was cut short. Laughing ones saw through these ones' disguises. These ones were ambushed in Thanalan.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_203でも……半年前……悲劇がおきたのでふっち。
正体がバレたわたぴらは、獣人誘拐犯に狙われ、
そして拉致されたのでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_204<tab>The sylphs slain in Thanalan... Gods, ye were one of 'em!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SKAETSWYS_000_204そして、「六識の反魂香」の被験体にされた……。
……そっか、ザナラーンの荒野に遺棄されていたシルフ族は、
アナタの仲間だったのね……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_205<tab>...Yes. This one escaped, but others were not so fortunate. It was then that this one made a vow. This one would bring Laughing ones to justice. This one assumed the form of walking one Sylvie, came to this place, and befriended kindly one Master Shanga.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_205わたぴはただひとり、誘拐犯の魔の手から逃れたのでふっち。
命からがら荒野をさまよっていたところを助けてくれたのが、
「アッシュクラウン商会」のシャンガ・メシャンガ会長。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_206<tab>Master Shanga is kindly one, but Master Shanga is still walking one. This one was afraid to reveal this one's true face. So this one toiled in secret, pursuing clawed one at every turn...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_206それ以来、わたぴは「変化のおまぢない」で正体を隠し、
仲間のカタキをとるために、
憎き獣人誘拐犯の足取りを追っていたのでふっち……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_204<tab>The acts of these vile men would throw a spanner into all of our efforts in building trust with the beastmen. Let us hurry to the Invisible City and put an end to their plot once and for all!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_204獣人を使った実験なんて……なんて卑劣な！
冒険者さん、シルビア……もとい、シルベシオさんと、
実験場である「見えざる都」に急行してください！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_208<tab>The Invisible City...a desolate place home to naught but the lost souls of ages long past. Whyever would this Memeriga choose such a remote place to work his dark magicks?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_LLOONGAH_000_208……でもよぉ。
「見えざる都」って、確か何もねぇ遺跡だぜ。
なんで奴ら、そんなとこをわざわざ実験場にしやがったんだ？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_209<tab>...Doubtless a ghost town on the outskirts of civilization is exactly what the Laughing Alchemists had in mind. Why, just think of what would happen if something went awry with the experiment.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_209何もない遺跡だからこそ、もってこいなのでしょう。
「六識の反魂香」の成分を吸い込まないように調合するには、
開けた屋外でなければなりませんし……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_210<tab>An army of undead beastchocobos running amok in plain view of the populace!? There would be panic!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_VOYCE_000_000_210それに、実験をするにも好都合です。
遺跡なら人目にもつかず、もし死霊化した獣人が暴走しても、
始末、逃亡できる……つくづく卑劣な奴らです！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_211<tab>...Er, yes, that sounds about right. Anyroad, the time for talking is through─it is time for action. We will inform the leaders of each of the respective beast tribe settlements, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and join you at the Invisible City shortly after.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_211冒険者さん、僕たちは各々の獣人の拠点に帰り、
それぞれの長に、この緊急事態を報告してきます。
そして必ず、あなたたちを助けに駆けつけます！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_212<tab>...And, ah, yes. I've been instructed to give you this.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_212……それとこれを。
これは「」という秘密兵器です。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_213<tab>I was told it was an explosive of sylphic make, enhanced somewhat by one Ba Go of the 789th Order, and then further modified for optimal throwing by the Ehcatl Nine.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_213仮宿のシルフ族が作った「ゲホゲホ燐粉爆弾」と、
アコライト789 バ・ゴさん特製の「ボム」を、
「エカトル空力団」の技術を借りて、融合させたものです。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_214<tab>Think of it as a collaborative effort by all of our beastman friends. I trust it will serve you well. Now let us go forth and put an end to Memeriga's mad plot!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_TATARAMU_000_000_214いわば、僕たちの絆の結晶！
皆の力を結集したこの秘密兵器で、
悪を吹き飛ばしてやりましょう！　では、お願いします！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_215<tab>Who are you!? We are conducting a top secret experiment here! Begone from here before I turn you into a zombie...or worse!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_215ん？　何だお前は！？
ええい、今、取り込み中だ！　遺跡に近寄るな！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_216<tab>This one has been waiting for brave one. Disguises will avail this one little here. This one will remain in this form and conserve strength for the battle ahead.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_216)) (( )) 02 /var>、待ってた……。
ここでは人目を気にして姿を変える必要はないから……。
魔力の温存のため、元の姿……でふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_217<tab>Walking ones who guard this place are some of deadliest swords in the realm, hired by Laughing one at great cost. This will not be an easy fight, not even for brave one. Is brave one ready to do battle?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_217それより、見えるでふっち……？
メメリガの部下たちは、大金で雇われた一流の傭兵。
かなりの死闘になる……戦闘の準備はいい……でふっち？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_Q1_000_000<tab>Is brave one ready?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_Q1_000_000<tab>戦闘の準備はいい……でふっち？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_A1_000_001<tab>To battle!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_A1_000_001<tab>いつでもこいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_A1_000_002<tab>I require a moment...
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_A1_000_002<tab>ちょっと待ってでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_218<tab>This one is ever heartened by brave one's resolve. Quietly, now, that Laughing ones might be caught by surprise.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_218頼もしい……でふっち！
まずは、敵の隙をうかがうでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_220<tab>(-Memeriga-)How many times do you have to stir that pot!? I'm not paying you by the hour, in case you've forgotten!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_220(-メメリガ-)まだか？　まだできんのか！？
ええい、ウスノロめっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ALCHEMIST01273_000_000_221<tab>(-Laughing Alchemist-)Heh heh heh... Forgive me, Master Memeriga. It shall not be long until the reagents are fully dissolved. Then our preparations will be complete...in theory.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ALCHEMIST01273_000_000_221(-自笑堂の錬金術師-)へぇ、すんません。
あとは蒸留した薬液を精製すれば、理論上は完成でさぁ。
……恐らくは。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_222<tab>(-Memeriga-)What do you mean, “in theory”!? I'm not paying you to <var 1A 02 /var>theorize<var 1A 01 /var>, I'm paying you to build me an army!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_222(-メメリガ-)恐らくは……だと？　ふざけるなっ！
この新薬開発に、いくら払ってると思ってるんだっ！
さっさと誘拐してきた蛮族どもに使うのだっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_223<tab>(-Memeriga-)Bwahahaha! Yes, it will not be long now! An army of undead beastmen at my beck and call─the greatest military force Eorzea has ever known! Untold riches─no, even the very domination of the realm is within my grasp!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_223(-メメリガ-)くふふ……我が不死の蛮兵どもがついに誕生する！
この兵力を操ることができれば……莫大な金が手に入る！
いや、むしろ、この私がエオルゼアの支配者となることも可能！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_224<tab>(-Seasoned Bodyguard-)Who goes there!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_224<tab>(-熟練の用心棒-)てめぇ！　何者だッ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_225<tab>Memeriga! This one has come for this one's friends!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_225メメリガ！
仲間たちを返すでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_226<tab>(-Memeriga-)Well, look who's here. If it isn't the little girl who's been fluttering about the realm, poking her nose into my business. Or did you think you could fool me with your silly little disguises?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_226(-メメリガ-)……貴様、知ってるぞ。
何やらコソコソと私たちのことを嗅ぎまわっていたらしいな。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_227<tab>(-Memeriga-)...It matters not. You and your friends are too late. The potion is all but complete, and there will be nothing to stop me! Your laughably “precious” companions will die, and their souls will serve me for eternity! Bwahahaha!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_227(-メメリガ-)だが遅かったな、腐れ野菜め！
「六識の反魂香」はすでに完成目前！
もはや、私の野望は誰も止めることはできん！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_228<tab>(-Memeriga-)...But do not mourn their fate, little girl...for you shall join them. Kill them all─but do try to be gentle about it.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_228(-メメリガ-)おっと、殺すなよ！　生け捕りにしろ！
蛮族ともども、貴様にも反魂香の香りを楽しませてやろう。
そして、永遠に死ぬことのない奴隷となるのだ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_229<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_229<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_230<tab>(-Stern Bodyguard-)Wh-What the...!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SOLDIER01273_000_000_230<tab>(-屈強な用心棒-)むッ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_231<tab>(-???-)Treacherous fiends. Purveyors of villainy. The vengeance of heaven is slow, but certain. You shall answer for your treachery this day.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_231(-？？？？-)大逆無道、悪事千里……。
天網恢恢、疎にして漏らさず。
西に悪あらばこれを断ち、東に魔あらばこれを滅す……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_232<tab>(-Memeriga-)Who is this that dares oppose me!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_232<tab>(-メメリガ-)何者だッ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_233<tab>I am the flame that quenches the shadow! The fist that crushes villainy! I am the warleader of the Brotherhood of Ash, Hamujj Gah, and my name shall be the last you utter with your dying screams!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_233我は「灰の一党」が筆頭……。
炎獄の灼風に舞いし一握の灰塵。
戦鬼、ハムジ・ガーと覚えておいていただこう！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_234<tab>I am Novv! The ssspear from the dark depths. Clutchfather first, and warrior sssecond.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_234同じく、サハギン族の戦士であり父、ノォヴ！
西ラノシアよりまかり来た！　フスィーッ！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_235<tab>Squawwwk! Sezul Totoloc of Ehcatl Nine, I am! How to count, Ehcatl Nine know not. How to fight, Ehcatl Nine know well! Forfeit, your life is!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_235泣く子も黙るッゥ「エカトル空力団」ッン！
セズル・トトロック、推参ッン！
バリバリッィ、喧嘩上等ッォ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_236<tab>This one is Frixio, elder of Little Solace. Laughing ones' crimes against little ones will not be forgiven!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_236ご存知「シルフの仮宿」の長ちゃまこと、フリクシオでぶっち！
冒険者どの、お待たせでぶっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_237<tab>Pickman Gi Gu of the 789th is here! ...And Gi Gu has, er, forgot his line─slipped his mind, drew a blank, forgot!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_237そしーて……ついナリユキで　来ちゃったけーど
ボクは　特に何もするつもりーはなーい
「第789洞穴団」の　ピックマン789 ギ・グ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_238<tab>...Now what does this do again?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_238え　えーと……コレかーな？
……………………えーい！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ALLSTAR_000_239<tab>(-All-)Together we are...the Beastman Alliance!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_ALLSTAR_000_239<tab>(-全員-)「六族連盟」、只今、参上！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_001_239<tab>Y-Ye gads! Those sparks almost took out Gi Gu's eye─burned, blew up, took out an eye! Gi Gu told Ba Go to go easy on the saltpeter...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_001_239あわわわーわ……
ちょっと火力が強すぎたーよ……
バ・ゴのヤーツ　頼んだボムを間違えたーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_240<tab>Laughing one's days of profiting in other ones' misfortune have come to an end. Return captured ones and surrender at once!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_240メメリガとやら、観念するでぶっち！
仲間たちを返してもらうでぶっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_241<tab>(-Memeriga-)Hah! As if a band of bumbling beastmen could stop me! You fools seal your fate...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_241(-メメリガ-)ええい！
邪魔をするつもりか、おぞましい蛮族どもめっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_242<tab>...Squawk!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_242<tab>……むッゥ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_243<tab>...And so the stage is set. Marvelous...simply marvelous!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_243フフフ……素晴らしい……
素晴らしい熱狂の舞台だ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_244<tab>You besssted me once, but this time you shall not be so fortunate. Feel my ssspear, shhhorewalker!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_244フスィーッ……今度こそ、不覚はとらん。
勝負だ、ヒトの戦士よ……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_245<tab>(-Memeriga-)What are you waiting for, you fool!? Kill them! Kill them all! Have you forgotten how much I'm paying you!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_245(-メメリガ-)フヒヒヒッ、「黒死の奏者」……ナザ・ア・ジャーブよ！
蛮族どもを殺せ！
払った大金分の仕事をするのだっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_246<tab>Keep your riches, Memeriga. I fight, but not for you.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_246フフ……このナザ・ア・ジャーブ、下衆の囀りなど聞く耳はもたぬ。
しかし、ここはあえて従おう。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_247<tab>Yes, let hatred and fear consume you. Come at me, let me taste the thrill of battle, and I will treat you to death's sweet embrace!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_247命を削り、しのぎ合う……その末に攫み獲る血塗れの勝利！
フハハ、これ以上の「熱狂」が、どこにあろう！
……さぁ、俺を楽しませてみろ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_248<tab>This is the distraction these ones needed! This one will go off and find the captured ones. Brave one must take scalebomb and destroy the cauldron!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_248わたぴは捕まった仲間を助けるでふっち！
)) (( )) 02 /var>！
アナタはその爆弾で、錬金釜を破壊するでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_250<tab>This one shall go in search of the captured ones. Walking one must destroy Laughing ones' cauldron before it is too late!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_250捕まった仲間は、わたぴに任せて……！
アナタはその爆弾で、錬金釜を破壊するでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_251<tab>Gwahahaha! Kill them! Kill them all! They shall rise again as my eternal slaves!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_251フヒヒヒヒヒヒヒヒヒ！！
「六識の反魂香」は、蛮族をゾンビーに変える！
最強不死兵団で、私は億万長者！　いや、帝王となるのだぁ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_260<tab>(-Memeriga-)Wh-What have you done!? That cauldron was made of solid mythril! Do you have any idea how much I paid for it!?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_260(-メメリガ-)うぎゃあああああああああああっ！！
ぜ、全財産をつぎこんだ錬金釜がああああっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_261<tab>(-Memeriga-)Five billion, six hundred million, eight hundred and seventy thousand gil! You've ruined me! Ruined meeeeeeeee!!!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_261(-メメリガ-)けっ、研究費用っ！　ご、5億6000万ギルっ！！
ごおくろくせんまんぎるぅぅぅぅぅぅぅぅっ！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_262<tab>Ahahaha! Yes, yesss! Let your hatred fuel you! Let me taste the rage that burns within you! Thrill me! Excite me! Delight me!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_262フハハハ……！　いいぞ！　そうだ！　この熱さだっ！
この熱狂こそが……我が魂を震わせる最高の瞬間！
そして舞台は、諸君らの死をもってついに完成される！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_263<tab>...And in return, I shall see your death is all the sweeter.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_263さぁ、俺に聞かせてくれ！
甘美なる死の五重奏を！
絶望の嘶きを、その醜い喉から絞り出せっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_264<tab>Your overconfidence will be your downfall, shhhorewalker...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_264フスィーッ、図に乗るな……若造！
我らがチカラ、思い知るがいい！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_265<tab>The battle drums pound, calling me to the fray. Lend me your strength, Elder.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_HAMUJIGAH_000_265死中求活！
我、これより死地に入る！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_266<tab>...You sad fool.
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_266<tab>……甘いなっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_268<tab>A magic shield!?
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_268<tab>魔法障壁だとッ！？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_269<tab>Squawk! Now, the time is! This, you must take!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SEZULTOTOLOC_000_000_269今だッァ！　ノォヴの大将ッォ！
オレ様特製の得物を使いやがれッェ！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_270<tab>And here's an extra boost─a push, a shove, a boost!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_270<tab>あわーわ　い　今だーよ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_273<tab>This...this feeling... I grow weak... The world around me grows dark... I... I...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_273貴様ら……っ……よ、よくも……
この「黒死の奏者」……ナザ・ア・ジャーブをっ！
この借りは必ず……必ず返すぞっ……！！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_274<tab>(-Memeriga-)Wh-Where do you think you're going!? That's my airship, you fool!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_274(-メメリガ-)き、貴様っ……そ、それは、私の脱出用飛空艇っ！
おのれ！　う、裏切ったな！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_275<tab>Ahahaha! I shall remember this day, my friends! You have proven yourselves worthy rivals, but do not think that you have won! No, I shall return to have my revenge!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_275ふははは、礼を言うぞ、蛮族ども！
この俺に、復讐という新たな目標をあたえてくれたことを！
いずれまた会おう！　さらなる「熱狂」の中でなっ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_276<tab>What's this? Gi Gu thought his bombs were all gone─used up, depleted, gone. Oh, well...here goes nothing!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_PICKMAN789GIGU_000_276あーれ　ボムちゃんが　もういっこ残ってたーよ？
ナンダコーレ？　ま　いーか
……………………えーい！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_277<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_277<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_278<tab>Laughing one's crimes have been reported to the highest authorities by the Ashcrown Consortium. This one suggests Laughing one goes quietly.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_278メメリガ、観念するでふっち。
お前の悪事は、アッシュクラウン商会を通じて、
ウルダハ政庁に報告済みでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_279<tab>Laughing one's crimes are grave, and riches will not save Laughing one this time. Laughing one will have much time to reflect on one's misdeeds as one rots in gaol.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_279もう、いくら賄賂を積もうと、
お前の罪は揉み消せないでふっち。
神妙にお縄につくでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_280<tab>(-Memeriga-)My army... My fortunes... Everything...gone...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_MEMERIGA_000_000_280(-メメリガ-)う……ううううう……。
私の……金……私の……計画……
ううううううう……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_267<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_267<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_271<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NOVV_000_271<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_272<tab>
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_NHAZAAJAAB_000_272<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_290<tab>Brave one...no, brave <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! This one...this one has no words to express depths of this one's gratitude...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_290)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
ついに……ついに、やったでふっち……。
メメリガの計画を……奴の野望を阻止したでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_291<tab>Nomexio... Flaxio... Is every one watching? Laughing ones are no more... Finally...after so long...every one can rest in peace...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_291ううう……やっと……仲間の仇を……討てたでふっち……。
ノメシオ……フラクシオ……見てるでふっち？
わたぴは……ついに……やったでふっち……！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_292<tab>...This one has been watching Silbexio. Yes, watching very closely.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_292見事でぶっち。
よくがんばったでぶっち、シルベシオ！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_293<tab>Elder one...? Elder one remembers this one?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_293長ちゃま……。
わたぴを憶えて……くれていたでふっち……？

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_294<tab>How could this one forget? This one remembers the day Silbexio left Little Solace as if it were yesterday...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_294もちろんでぶっち。
お前さんたちが仮宿を旅立ったときのことを、
昨日のように思い出すでぶっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_295<tab>This one's heart was heavy. Yet deep down, this one knew. If any one could survive the harsh world outside the forest and build peace with walking ones, it is Silbexio, strong of will and pure of heart.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_295シルベシオ、お前さんは本当に強い子でぶっち。
仲間を殺され、たったひとり、孤独に戦っていたんでぶっち？
……よくがんばったでぶっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_296<tab>Silbexio was alone for so long...but no longer. Other ones will welcome Silbexio back to Little Solace as a hero to all sylphkind.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_296ワチシも、もっと早く手助けができれば……
ノメシオも、フラクシオも助けてあげられたのでぶっち。
本当にすまなかったでぶっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_297<tab>Elder one is too kind... This one is not strong... This one is...is...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_297長ちゃま……！
もったいないお言葉でふっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_298<tab>Say no more, Silbexio. Silbexio must save strength for the journey home.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_298拐われた者たちは、各々の長が責任をもって連れ帰るでぶっち。
これにて、一件落着でぶっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_299<tab>...Brave one. Brave one is friend not only to these ones, but to gilled ones and winged ones and scaled ones and furry ones, too. It is brave one that has brought all ones together.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_299冒険者どの、すべては、お前さんのおかげ。
お前さんへの信頼の絆が、
ワチシらをこの地に呼び寄せたでぶっち。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_300<tab>This one will always remember this day. This day, this one learned what can be accomplished when ones of all shapes and sizes come together as one.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_FRIXIO_000_000_300我ら「六族連盟」、いついかなるときも種族の垣根を越え、
ともに協力し、あらゆる危機に立ち向かう……！
その絆を、決して忘れないでほしいでぶっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_301<tab>This one is forever in brave one's debt. This one would return one last time to the Ashcrown Consortium. Brave one will come, too, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_301冒険者さん……
「アッシュクラウン商会」でお待ちしているでふっち。
改めて……お礼を言わせてほしいでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_310<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was Sylvie when we first met, and it is as Sylvie I would express my gratitude to you now.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_310)) (( )) 02 /var>、待ってた……。
私です、シルベシオ……いえ、今は「シルビア」……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_311<tab>When I left Little Solace behind, I was a wide-eyed child, my mind and heart filled with wild fancies.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_311……仲間とともに「シルフの仮宿」を去り、
このヒトの社会へとやってきたとき、
私は高い理想と希望に満ちていた……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_312<tab>Your people and ours are not so different! We have our differences, but with time and open dialogue, yes─it is only a matter of time before we can all live in harmony!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_312ヒトと獣人はわかり合える。
様々な問題はあれど、ともに手を取り合い、
このエオルゼアで平和に共存していける……と。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_313<tab>...Then my friends were captured, murdered in cold blood by Memeriga's lackeys. I saw the meaningless hurt and hatred directed at beastmen here in Ul'dah. The depths of hatred I felt for your kind...I could not put them into words.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_313しかし、仲間がメメリガに拐われ、そして殺されたとき、
希望はいつしか失望へと変わり、そして絶望となった……。
……どんなにヒトを恨んだか。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_314<tab>Then I met people like Master Shanga...and you. I saw man and beastman working, fighting together for the greater good. Slowly but surely, it all came back to me. It would not be easy, but perhaps my dream could still be achieved...
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_314でも、アナタと知り合い、私は再び希望を取り戻した……。
6つの種族が信頼の絆で結ばれ、力を合わせ生きていく……。
その可能性を、冒険者さんは私に示してくれた……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_315<tab>Observing the battle at the Invisible City, I know now more than ever that this is true. The bonds forged today will burn strong, a beacon of hope for all that would look beyond their differences to join their neighbor in the fight for a better tomorrow.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_315私は、アナタからもらった、
その理想と希望の火を消すことなく、受け継いでいく……。
「アッシュクラウン商会」の仲間たちと……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_316<tab>I know not if our paths will cross again, but I know this: Eorzea is a better place for your presence. Farewell, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...and thank you.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SILVIA_000_000_316さようなら、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
そして……ありがとうでふっち。
本当に……本当に……。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_000_400<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Allied<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Brotherhood of Ash, the sylphs of Little Solace, Novv's Clutch, the 789th Order, and the Ehcatl Nine.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_000_400「アマルジャ族」「シルフ族」「サハギン族」
「コボルド族」「イクサル族」……
すべての種族との友好関係が「盟友」になりました！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_100_400<tab>Furthermore, you now have access to a wider selection of wares from the vendors of all five beast tribes.
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_100_400これにより、各種族の拠点にいる「よろず屋」より、
「友好関係：盟友」の商品の購入ができるようになります。

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>Through your efforts, the most prominent beast tribes of Eorzea have forged bonds of friendship that promise to remain strong through the years. You are truly a hero to beastmen across the realm!
target:
TEXT_BANALL070_01473_SYSTEM_000_401冒険者の活躍により、エオルゼア主要6種族は、
これからも固く深い絆によって共存していくことでしょう！
「蛮族デイリークエスト」、大変おつかれさまでした！

source: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>The battle is joined!
target: TEXT_BANALL070_01473_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！
